creator: RBLDE Unconventional S.L.
descriptionHtml:
Prepaid Mastercard® card and online bank account without fees on your mobile phone. No hassles, no waiting, no stress. Also, our prepaid Mastercard card is compatible with Google Pay, making it very easy to manage your purchases and payments.

Download our app, sign up in 3 minutes, top-up your account and burn some cash 🔥 🔥
We are the Neobank of the New Generation. In fact, our current account and card are available for the youth too. So, if you are over 14 years old, you are Rebel: Teens, welcome on board!

With Rebellion Pay you can benefit from many features:

- A Prepaid Mastercard® card and online bank account without fees on your mobile phone. Apple Pay available to pay with your smartphone anywhere.
- If you are over 14 years old, you are Rebel: Teens, welcome!
- At the moment we only accept Spanish ID cards and TIE (residence permit). We are working hard to change this so anyone can be a Rebel #WePromise.
- With Rebellion you will have:
- A Virtual Card, perfect for your online purchases and subscriptions: Amazon, Zalando, AliExpress, HBO, Netflix or the PlayStation Store. Bye, bye cash.
- Personalized material card with your name, for those who love the physical world
- Withdraw cash at ATMs and you can use it for everything digital. Get it now!
- A personal account number (Spanish IBAN), so you can receive and send bank transfers. - Receive your scholarship, payroll or pay your landlord #ZeroDrama
- Your movements under control in real time: You'll know how much money you have and what you're spending it on.
- Flash Transfers instantly between Rebellion users. Send and receive money too and from Rebels instantly and totally FREE. Ideal for splitting bills, you will never be missing money again.
- Super security: Activate, deactivate or lock your card at any time from the app.
- Promotions and raffles every week.

Become a Rebel, download the app!


More reasons to choose Rebellion Pay:

The same benefits as an online bank, digital and virtual: our clients are young, they have a fast-paced life and prefer to avoid queues and manage all their transactions online. This is why our service is completely online.

Online bank account and card without commissions: opening the account is totally free and you will not have to pay any registration or maintenance fees.

Opening your account is very simple: download our app, grab your identity card, take a selfie and start sending and receiving money online. Super Easy 😊

Travel Card: Rebellion Pay's Mastercard is ideal for traveling. You can book hotels, flights, guided tours, pay in restaurants and shops.

Card for buying video games: you can buy your favorite video games and also use your card at the Playstation Store.

Card to save money: yes, with our exclusive promotions and discounts saving will be super easy 😊. You will often find discount coupons of up to 20% to pay in stores like Amazon, Aliexpress, Asos...And if you invite a friend, you will get a little money for free. Oh Yeah 😎

Google Pay Mastercard: our Mastercard is compatible with Google Pay, which means: you can pay with your mobile phone on websites and apps with just one click; if you are in a shop, you will pay safely, as the real info of your card will never be shared and your data will be protected; and at the same time you will save time, as it is faster to pay with your mobile phone, which follows you 24/7, than having to search for the physical card in your wallet.

Prepaid Card for Young People: Rebellion Pay is also designed for young people, so they learn how to manage their finances on their own, without having the risks and temptations of a credit card

You can register and use the Rebellion account and card with:

Spanish ID card or TIE (Residence Permit)


Become a Rebel, go DOWNLOAD!
descriptionShort: With Rebellion Pay, open your account and start your mobile banking journey

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
"Hey, Rebel! 

This week we bring the following updates:

- More info on the movements
- Ability to generate PDF documents with the proof of a bank transfer and the certificaste of ownership of your account
- New warnings: Top-up limits and top-up failures
- Modify your profile picture and your username
- Ability to remove top-up cards

#LikeNoBank"

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hey Rebel!

We bring a small update, which prepares the way for big things to come:

-Customize your movements with an image and a description. We want your movements to tell stories. Add a memory, a ticket, a picture of your purchase... make your movements more than just a transaction.
-Now you can hide your balance, so you can show your movements with total freedom. We have also made some changes to make them more easily read.

[#] LikeNoBank

title: Rebellion Pay | Bank and Card for Online Payments

creator: RBLDE Unconventional S.L.
descriptionHtml:
We simplify banking to the maximum: prepaid Mastercard® and mobile account. Without changing banks, without maintenance costs, without fees. That easy.

Sign up in 5 minutes, top-up your account and make purchases safely. In a few days, you will not want to take out your old card anymore.


With Rebellion you will have:

- Virtual Card: perfect to pay your subscriptions and purchase online with total security. Amazon, AliExpress, HBO, Netflix, PlayStation Store ...
- Material Mastercard®: withdraw for free on the ATM of your choice and pay via contactless. Use it for your purchases in stores and pay online as much as you want.
- Google Pay: add your card to your Google Wallet, leave your wallet at home and pay with your mobile.
- Personal account number: Spanish IBAN. Receive your payroll, pay the rent, send and receive bank transfers totally free.
- Flash Transfers: send and receive money between Rebels instantly and totally free. Great to split the check, they will not owe you money again.
- Buy safely: activate and deactivate your card at any time from the app.
- Control your expenses: movements in real-time with expanded information that is easily understood.
- Social feed: discover where your friends buy and share your purchases with them.
- Automatic top-ups: forget about an empty account. Program your top-up and… relax.
- Perfect for travelling: withdraw money from international ATMs without additional fees for currency exchange.
- Advantages + Rebel: promotions, cashbacks and discounts so you can save money.

Become a Rebel #LikeNoBank

At the moment we only accept Spanish DNIs (IDs) and TIEs (residence permits).
descriptionShort: With Rebellion Pay, open your account and start your mobile banking journey

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hey Rebel, we bring more news!

Now all your account actions are easier to access through the new Wallet menu. Download your movements, add money to your account, check your IBAN... and much more.

Discover everything you can do with Rebellion: in your profile you'll find a new section where we showcase everything you can do to manage your money. Don't forget to pass by!

Also, more improvements to make the app even sleekier.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hey, Rebels!
Before the year is gone, we wanted to bring you more updates and superpowers.

- Now you can give money away to anyone, even if they're not Rebellion users.

- Now you can request money from any rebel through a Flash Transfer. Go to "Move €", enter the amount, then press "Request", "Flash Transfer"... and enjoy it!

- And, lastly, we have created a brand new section called INBOX. Here is where you will find the money requests from other rebels and major pending actions.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hey Rebel!

You've been asking for it and we've worked hard to make it happen. You can now direct debit your bills (water, electricity, gas, internet...) through your Rebellion account.
You will see your bills directly in your wallet. This way you will always have your money under control.
We have also improved the experience in our Rebel Feed, from now on you will be able to see the activity from your contacts in a new tab and you will know who is interacting with your posts.

title: Rebellion Pay | Bank and Card for Online Payments

creator: RBLDE Unconventional S.L.
descriptionHtml:
We simplify banking to the maximum: prepaid Mastercard® and mobile account. Without changing banks, without maintenance costs, without fees. That easy.

Sign up in 5 minutes, top-up your account and make purchases safely. In a few days, you will not want to take out your old card anymore.


With Rebellion you will have:

- Virtual Card: perfect to pay your subscriptions and purchase online with total security. Amazon, AliExpress, HBO, Netflix, PlayStation Store ...
- Material Mastercard®: withdraw for free on the ATM of your choice and pay via contactless. Use it for your purchases in stores and pay online as much as you want.
- Google Pay: add your card to your Google Wallet, leave your wallet at home and pay with your mobile.
- Personal account number: Spanish IBAN. Receive your payroll, pay the rent, send and receive bank transfers totally free.

- Control your expenses: movements in real-time with expanded information that is easily understood.
- Social feed: discover where your friends buy and share your purchases with them.
- Automatic top-ups: forget about an empty account. Program your top-up and… relax.
- Perfect for travelling: withdraw money from international ATMs without additional fees for currency exchange.
- Advantages + Rebel: promotions, cashbacks and discounts so you can save money.

Become a Rebel #LikeNoBank

At the moment we only accept Spanish DNIs (IDs) and TIEs (residence permits).

title: Rebellion Pay | Bank and Card for Online Payments

creator: RBLDE Unconventional S.L.
descriptionHtml:
Get your Mastercard® card and current account number online on your mobile phone.

No hassle, no waiting, no permanence. Our prepaid Mastercard® card is compatible with Google Pay, so you can pay with your mobile with total security and contactless. With Rebellion, managing your online purchases and payments is really easy.

Download our app, sign up in 5 minutes and top up your current account to start spending at your favourite retailers and buying cryptocurrencies with the lowest fees on the market🔥🔥🔥.

A current account designed for you to have full control of your money and trade with cryptocurrencies.

With Rebellion Pay you’ll get many benefits

- Free virtual card and material card, ideal for your online shopping and payments with Google Play. Pay at your favourite retailers: Amazon, Zalando, AliExpress, HBO, Netflix, PlayStation Store y withdraw money at ATMs without any fees. Our card is simply perfect for online payments 💣
- Personal account number (IBAN), so you can send and receive money online via bank transfers. Have your salary paid here, set up a direct debit for your bills or pay your landlord.
- Buy bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH) and Dogecoin (DOGE) and sell whenever you want. Your funds are always available! When you sell cryptocurrencies, your funds are transferred to your Rebellion account, with no additional fees.
- Control your transactions and cryptos in real time: You will know how much money you have and what you are spending it on.
- Instant Flash Transfers between Rebellion buddies. You can pay and send money to friends instantly ⚡ and 100% FREE .
- Paysafecard for your personal security: activate, deactivate or block your card at any time from the app.

Other reasons to choose Rebellion Pay

- The same convenience of an online, digital, virtual bank: Manage all your transactions online. Any problems? Don't worry—we have the best Support Team in the world!
- Online current account and card without fees: opening the account is totally free and you won't have to pay ANYTHING.
- Opening your account takes 5 minutes: download our app, add your ID, take a selfie and start sending and receiving money from your mobile 😊
- A card for your trips: the Rebellion Pay Mastercard® card is ideal for when you are travelling. Save fees when withdrawing money at ATMs or paying in a currency other than the euro.
- A card to buy video games: you can buy your favourite video games and also use your card at the PlayStation Store.
- A card to save money: with our exclusive campaigns and discounts, saving money is really easy 😊. You'll often find vouchers with up to 20% discount to pay at shops such as Amazon, AliExpress, Asos... And if you invite a friend, you'll get some free cash, too 😎
- Google Pay Mastercard®: our Mastercard® card is compatible with Google Pay, which means: your mobile payments on websites and apps can be done with just one click; if you are in a shop, you will pay securely, as the real info of your card will never be shared and your data will be protected; you can save time, as it is faster to pay with your mobile, which is with you 24/7, rather than having to look for your card in your wallet.
- Buy bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies: Money is not only for spending, but also for growing 🚀 Invest in bitcoin, Ethereum or Dogecoin and sell whenever you want. Now buying bitcoin and cryptocurrencies is really easy, with no added fees.

You can sign up and start using your Rebellion account and card with:
- Spanish ID or TIE (residence permit)
- ID or european passport if you live in Spain and have a Spanish mobile phone number.

Become a Rebel—click Download!

#LikeNoBank

title: Rebellion Pay - Pay account and cryptocurrencies

creator: RBLDE Unconventional S.L.
descriptionHtml:
Get your Mastercard® card and current account number online on your mobile phone.

No hassle, no waiting, no permanence. Our prepaid Mastercard® card is compatible with Google Pay, so you can pay with your mobile with total security and contactless. With Rebellion, managing your online purchases and payments is really easy.

Download our app, sign up in 5 minutes and top up your current account to start spending at your favourite retailers and buying cryptocurrencies with the lowest fees on the market🔥🔥🔥.

A current account designed for you to have full control of your money and trade with cryptocurrencies.

With Rebellion Pay you’ll get many benefits

- Free virtual card and material card, ideal for your online shopping and payments with Google Play. Pay at your favourite retailers: Amazon, Zalando, AliExpress, HBO, Netflix, PlayStation Store y withdraw money at ATMs without any fees. Our card is simply perfect for online payments 💣
- Personal account number (IBAN), so you can send and receive money online via bank transfers. Have your salary paid here, set up a direct debit for your bills or pay your landlord.
- Buy bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH) and Dogecoin (DOGE) and sell whenever you want. Your funds are always available! When you sell cryptocurrencies, your funds are transferred to your Rebellion account, with no additional fees.
- Control your transactions and cryptos in real time: You will know how much money you have and what you are spending it on.
- Instant Flash Transfers between Rebellion buddies. You can pay and send money to friends instantly ⚡ and 100% FREE .
- Paysafecard for your personal security: activate, deactivate or block your card at any time from the app.

Other reasons to choose Rebellion Pay

- The same convenience of an online, digital, virtual bank: Manage all your transactions online. Any problems? Don't worry—we have the best Support Team in the world!
- Online current account and card without fees: opening the account is totally free and you won't have to pay ANYTHING.
- Opening your account takes 5 minutes: download our app, add your ID, take a selfie and start sending and receiving money from your mobile 😊
- A card for your trips: the Rebellion Pay Mastercard® card is ideal for when you are travelling. Save fees when withdrawing money at ATMs or paying in a currency other than the euro.
- A card to buy video games: you can buy your favourite video games and also use your card at the PlayStation Store.
- A card to save money: with our exclusive campaigns and discounts, saving money is really easy 😊. You'll often find vouchers with up to 20% discount to pay at shops such as Amazon, AliExpress, Asos... And if you invite a friend, you'll get some free cash, too 😎
- Google Pay Mastercard®: our Mastercard® card is compatible with Google Pay, which means: your mobile payments on websites and apps can be done with just one click; if you are in a shop, you will pay securely, as the real info of your card will never be shared and your data will be protected; you can save time, as it is faster to pay with your mobile, which is with you 24/7, rather than having to look for your card in your wallet.
- Buy bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies: Money is not only for spending, but also for growing 🚀 Invest in bitcoin, Ethereum or Dogecoin and sell whenever you want. Now buying bitcoin and cryptocurrencies is really easy, with no added fees.

You can sign up and start using your Rebellion account and card with:
- Spanish ID or TIE (residence permit)
- ID or european passport if you live in Spain and have a Spanish mobile phone number.

Become a Rebel—click Download!
descriptionShort: An online account to pay with your phone and to buy bitcoin and other crypto

We have more news!

Are you new in Rebellion? Download the app, we have a GREAT surprise for you.

Enjoy your summer!

- In this release we improved our cryptocurrency exchange system. BTW we are releasing tokens almost every week.
- We fixed some bugs with instant transfers. Now they are working perfectly.
- You can change your primary phone number inside your profile.
- And finally, we have implemented a simple system to update your legal documentation.

#LikeNoBank

title: Rebellion Pay - Pay account and cryptocurrencies

creator: RBLDE Unconventional S.L.
descriptionHtml:
Get your Mastercard® card and current account number online on your mobile phone.

No hassle, no waiting, no permanence. Our prepaid Mastercard® card is compatible with Google Pay, so you can pay with your mobile with total security and contactless. With Rebellion, managing your online purchases and payments is really easy.

Download our app, sign up in 5 minutes and top up your current account to start spending at your favourite retailers and buying cryptocurrencies with the lowest fees on the market🔥🔥🔥.

A current account designed for you to have full control of your money and trade with cryptocurrencies.

With Rebellion Pay you’ll get many benefits

- Free virtual card and material card, ideal for your online shopping and payments with Google Play. Pay at your favourite retailers: Amazon, Zalando, AliExpress, HBO, Netflix, PlayStation Store y withdraw money at ATMs without any fees. Our card is simply perfect for online payments 💣
- Personal account number (IBAN), so you can send and receive money online via bank transfers. Have your salary paid here, set up a direct debit for your bills or pay your landlord.
- Buy bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH) and Dogecoin (DOGE) and sell whenever you want. Your funds are always available! When you sell cryptocurrencies, your funds are transferred to your Rebellion account, with no additional fees.
- Control your transactions and cryptos in real time: You will know how much money you have and what you are spending it on.
- Instant Flash Transfers between Rebellion buddies. You can pay and send money to friends instantly ⚡ and 100% FREE .
- Paysafecard for your personal security: activate, deactivate or block your card at any time from the app.

Other reasons to choose Rebellion Pay

- The same convenience of an online, digital, virtual bank: Manage all your transactions online. Any problems? Don't worry—we have the best Support Team in the world!
- Online current account and card without fees: opening the account is totally free and you won't have to pay ANYTHING.
- Opening your account takes 5 minutes: download our app, add your ID, take a selfie and start sending and receiving money from your mobile 😊
- A card for your trips: the Rebellion Pay Mastercard® card is ideal for when you are travelling. Save fees when withdrawing money at ATMs or paying in a currency other than the euro.
- A card to buy video games: you can buy your favourite video games and also use your card at the PlayStation Store.
- A card to save money: with our exclusive campaigns and discounts, saving money is really easy 😊. You'll often find vouchers with up to 20% discount to pay at shops such as Amazon, AliExpress, Asos... And if you invite a friend, you'll get some free cash, too 😎
- Google Pay Mastercard®: our Mastercard® card is compatible with Google Pay, which means: your mobile payments on websites and apps can be done with just one click; if you are in a shop, you will pay securely, as the real info of your card will never be shared and your data will be protected; you can save time, as it is faster to pay with your mobile, which is with you 24/7, rather than having to look for your card in your wallet.
- Buy bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies: Money is not only for spending, but also for growing 🚀 Invest in bitcoin, Ethereum or Dogecoin and sell whenever you want. Now buying bitcoin and cryptocurrencies is really easy, with no added fees.

You can sign up and start using your Rebellion account and card with:
- Spanish ID or TIE (residence permit)
- ID or european passport if you live in Spain and have a Spanish mobile phone number.

Become a Rebel—click Download!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hey Rebel!

We increased the security of on-line shopping. Now, in addition to the SMS code, we will ask you for a password (online shopping code) that you can set up in the app.

Now you can renew your card when the expiry date is getting close. Via the app and free of charge.

We have improved some aesthetics and usability elements.

By the way, we are working on something very exciting that will be released soon, stay tuned!

Thanks for your trust. Let's go!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Happy new year,

Now you can download a report with all your buying and selling cryptocurrencies transactions.

We would like to tell you that this year is going to be a real blast. Among other things, we are going to focus on multi-person money management and effortless savings. We will boost cryptocurrencies and you will enjoy a new Rebellion that is more modular and adaptable to your way of life.

We wish you a great start of the year. Thank you very much for your support.

No hassle, no waiting, no permanence. Our prepaid Mastercard® card is compatible with Google Pay, so you can pay with your mobile with total security and contactless. With Rebellion, managing your online purchases and payments is really easy.

Download our app, sign up in 5 minutes and top up your current account to start spending at your favourite retailers and buying cryptocurrencies with the lowest fees on the market🔥🔥🔥.

A current account designed for you to have full control of your money and trade with cryptocurrencies.

With Rebellion Pay you’ll get many benefits

- Free virtual card and material card, ideal for your online shopping and payments with Google Play. Pay at your favourite retailers: Amazon, Zalando, AliExpress, HBO, Netflix, PlayStation Store y withdraw money at ATMs without any fees. Our card is simply perfect for online payments 💣
- Personal account number (IBAN), so you can send and receive money online via bank transfers. Have your salary paid here, set up a direct debit for your bills or pay your landlord.
- Buy bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH) and Dogecoin (DOGE) and sell whenever you want. Your funds are always available! When you sell cryptocurrencies, your funds are transferred to your Rebellion account, with no additional fees.
- Control your transactions and cryptos in real time: You will know how much money you have and what you are spending it on.
- Instant Flash Transfers between Rebellion buddies. You can pay and send money to friends instantly ⚡ and 100% FREE .
- Paysafecard for your personal security: activate, deactivate or block your card at any time from the app.

Other reasons to choose Rebellion Pay

- The same convenience of an online, digital, virtual bank: Manage all your transactions online. Any problems? Don't worry—we have the best Support Team in the world!
- Online current account and card without fees: opening the account is totally free and you won't have to pay ANYTHING.
- Opening your account takes 5 minutes: download our app, add your ID, take a selfie and start sending and receiving money from your mobile 😊
- A card for your trips: the Rebellion Pay Mastercard® card is ideal for when you are travelling. Save fees when withdrawing money at ATMs or paying in a currency other than the euro.
- A card to buy video games: you can buy your favourite video games and also use your card at the PlayStation Store.
- A card to save money: with our exclusive campaigns and discounts, saving money is really easy 😊. You'll often find vouchers with up to 20% discount to pay at shops such as Amazon, AliExpress, Asos... And if you invite a friend, you'll get some free cash, too 😎
- Google Pay Mastercard®: our Mastercard® card is compatible with Google Pay, which means: your mobile payments on websites and apps can be done with just one click; if you are in a shop, you will pay securely, as the real info of your card will never be shared and your data will be protected; you can save time, as it is faster to pay with your mobile, which is with you 24/7, rather than having to look for your card in your wallet.
- Buy bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies: Money is not only for spending, but also for growing 🚀 Invest in bitcoin, Ethereum or Dogecoin and sell whenever you want. Now buying bitcoin and cryptocurrencies is really easy, with no added fees.

You can sign up and start using your Rebellion account and card with:
- Spanish ID or TIE (residence permit)
- ID or european passport if you live in Spain and have a Spanish mobile phone number.

Become a Rebel—click Download!
descriptionShort: An online account to pay with your phone and to buy bitcoin and other crypto

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
In this version:

- Improved the system for buying and selling cryptos.

- New payments through QR: Use your personal QR at any time so you can be paid by any Rebellion user without sharing your contact details. You will be able to pay a Rebellion user by scanning their QR code. Soon will be also available for non-Rebellion users.

- Improved the functioning of the Online Shopping Code.

- Improved the Inbox performance.

- Other internal performance improvements.

A current account designed for you to have control of your money.

No hassle, no permanence. Our prepaid Mastercard® card is compatible with con Google Pay, so you can pay with your mobile phone in complete security and without contacts. With Rebellion, managing your online purchases and payments is really simple.

Download our app, sign up in 5 minutes and top up your current account to spend at your favourite retailers.

Get your Mastercard® card and current account number online on your mobile. With Rebellion Payyou can enjoy many advantages:

- Free virtual card and material card, perfect for your online shopping and Google Pay payments. Pay at your favourite retailers: Amazon, Zalando, AliExpress, HBO, Netflix, PlayStation Store and withdraw money from ATMs without any fees. Our card is perfect for online payments 💣
- Personal account number (IBAN), so you can receive and send money online via instant bank transfers for free. Pay your salary, direct debit your bills or pay your landlord.
- Instant Flash Transfers between Rebels. You can pay and send money to friends instantly⚡and 100% FREE.
- Super secure card: Card with two-step verification for payments, immediate blocking and full control from the app.

More reasons to choose Rebellion Pay

- The same convenience of an online, digital and virtual bank: Manage all your transactions online. Any problems? Don't worry, our premium support is for everyone, without distinction!
- Online current account and card without fees: opening the account is totally free, you won't have to pay ANYTHING.
- Opening your account takes just 5 minutes: download our app, add your ID, take a selfie and start sending and receiving money from your mobile 😊
- Card for travelling: the Rebellion Pay Mastercard® card is ideal for when you're on the go. Save fees when withdrawing cash at ATMs or paying in a currency other than euro.
- Card to save money: with our exclusive promotions and discounts, saving money is easy 😊. You'll often find coupons up to 30% off to pay at shops like Amazon, AliExpress, Asos, Uber... And if you invite a friend, you'll get a little money for free 😎
- Google Pay Mastercard®: our Mastercard® card is compatible with Google Pay, which means: your mobile payments on websites and apps, with just one click; if you are in a shop, you will pay securely, as the real info of your card will never be shared and your data will be protected; you can save time, as it is faster to pay with your mobile phone, which is with you 24/7, than having to look for your card in your wallet.

You can sign up and use the Rebellion account and card with:
- Spanish ID (DNI) or Spanish Residence Permit (TIE).
- European ID or passport if you live in Spain and have a Spanish mobile number.

Become a Rebel—click on download!
